section.heading: Reporting.
section.text: Beginning on January 1, 2011, and every 6 months thereafter, the Mayor shall provide the following information, delineated by month, to the Council, the:

para.text: Number of households participating in the District’s cash assistance TANF programs;
Number of households participating in SNAP;
Number of homeless households participating in SNAP;
Number of households who left the District’s cash assistance TANF programs, including the reasons they left;
Number of households who left SNAP, including the reasons they left; and
Number of SNAP participants who are self-employed.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 5084 of Fiscal Year 2011 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-463, July 2, 2010, 57 DCR 6542).
